rules_text:
Experience [i](Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever Primal Ruffian attacks, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. [i](If it had no counters on it when it attacked, this ability does not trigger.)[/i]
